name: Drop-O-Trons!
description:
This might not be the most original game ever, but I thought it was cute and satisfying :)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Move the blue square forward with x

Move the Drop-O-Tron with left and right arrows

Drop a pink square with the down arrow

Destroy the ground with the up arrow (only using the Drop-O-Tron 4000)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=61f5b03d605c0b3e6fcc78fb75523346
